original_title: Paris est une fête - Un film en 18 vagues
overview: Sylvain George crosses Paris in 2015 and 2016 with an “unaccompanied foreign minor”, as the official term has it. This splendid whirlwind in black-and-white mixes the details of iconic monuments – an equestrian statue, the obelisk or the big wheel – with life in the streets.
title: Paris is a Moveable Feast - A Film in 18 Waves
